title: Hard Crashes during Champ Select/Load
body:
My computer crashes during transition from champ select to loading screen. It only does this for League (other games run just fine).

Tech Support Guy System Info Utility version 1.0.0.4
OS Version: Microsoft Windows 8.1, 64 bit
Processor: AMD FX(tm)-6300 Six-Core Processor, AMD64 Family 21 Model 2 Stepping 0
Processor Count: 6
RAM: 8092 Mb
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, -2048 Mb
Hard Drives: C: 931 GB (341 GB Free);
Motherboard: ASUSTeK COMPUTER INC., M5A97 LE R2.0
Antivirus: Windows Defender, Disabled

I am using the new client.

Symptoms of the crash are a complete loss of power.

I am not running hot, nor am I over my wattage (still have approx 200W-300W overhead).

Please assist! I do not want to get flagged as a habitual leaver over this.

replies.body:
A complete loss of power? That's certainly not good! There are some system driver or hardware issues that could be causing this, so I recommend working through our [**Bugsplat & Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions. Additionally, I recommend testing any changes in a custom match to avoid penalties.

Please let me know if this caused any change.
